resources.string: Enables an additional check after clicking startup, to prevent accidental startup
Allows overrides to outputs during operation

Allow the ability to manually control outputs like the igniter, fan and auger, during normal operation. Keep in mind that during normal operation the igniter, fan and auger may (or may not) be controlled by the controller and user changes may be overridden. Use the above override time to block the controller from making changes for a period of seconds.

In an error condition (temp too low, temp too high) the grill will immediately shutdown and log the error in the events log. Notifications of an error will be sent if enabled. The Max Temp safety setting is also enabled in Monitor mode.

Safety features are not infallible and may not prevent safety issues with your grill in all cases. As with any grill, it is the operator\'s responsibility to monitor their equipment to ensure proper operational safety.
